details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ اٰتنا من لدنك رحمة وهيئ لـنا من امرنا رشدا‏
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اٰتِنَا مِنۡ لَّدُنۡكَ رَحۡمَةً وَّهَيِّئۡ لَـنَا مِنۡ اَمۡرِنَا رَشَدًا‏
details.transliteration: Rabbana 'atina mil-ladunka Rahmataw wa hayyi lana min amrina rashada
details.translations: Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.

pageTitle: Asking for correcting affairs and mercy[18:10]
